articles.author: Marita Moloney
articles.title: The areas deemed 'safe' for Irish tourists as grim update given for Spain, Portugal and more - Irish Mirror
articles.description: There are several European holiday hotspots struggling to contain the spread of Covid-19
articles.content:
Irish holidaymakers are being warned to avoid certain regions in Europe as coronavirus cases continue to surge.
Thousands of sun-seekers have been taking advantage of the EU Digital Green Cert since… [+2909 chars]
